dev: npm run openapi && envCli wait-port ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}${API_PING_PATH} && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n next,routing -c green,magenta "next dev" "npm run dr:build:watch"
build: npm run dr:build && npm run openapi && envCli wait-port ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}${API_PING_PATH} && next build
openapi: npm run openapi:yaml && npm run openapi:html
